body_html: thpp-compatibility literally calls the raw TH api (which is why it's able to create a tensor without ever initializing a context.) @li-roy and I talked about this, and I think the new plan is that we'll just fix thpp-compatibility to manually initialize the context (since this patch clearly does not work.)

body: thpp-compatibility literally calls the raw TH api (which is why it's able to create a tensor without ever initializing a context.) @li-roy and I talked about this, and I think the new plan is that we'll just fix thpp-compatibility to manually initialize the context (since this patch clearly does not work.)
